description: Severe splintering and breakage of the wood on the left side of the back apron, near its connection point with the back left leg.
Splintering and minor breakage of the wood on the right side of the back apron, near its connection point with the back right leg.
Severe splintering and breakage at the top of the leg, exposing the internal joint structure, consistent with a connection point for an apron or seat.
Crack at the top of the front right leg, consistent with its connection point for an apron or seat.
Large piece of wood chipped from the seat in the middle of the chair.
